      • securePooledConnection

        public int securePooledConnection(String workSpaceRemote,
                         org.rosuda.REngine.REXP initialData,
                         boolean reestablishConnection,
                         int existingConnection)
                           throws DvnRService.DvnRServiceException
        this method _secures_ a pooled connection for the caller. this can be an existing connection that the thread has been using; or a brand new connection created and placed in an empty spot on position on the stack; or a connection created and put in place of an existing connection that was deemed "the least recent".
        Parameters:
        workSpaceRemote - saved R space ("remote" means saved on the server side); it is also used as the session id tag.
        cMatrix - words/doc matrix, on the application side
        reestablishConnection - boolean indicating if this is an attempt to open a connection for an ongoing session;
        existingConnecton - index of a connection already on the stack
        Returns:
        index of the pooled connection secured and locked for the requestor.
        Throws:
        DvnRService.DvnRServiceException
